summary: Add a dashboard filter/sort option to view entries by date and store name, keeping the rest of the application unchanged (including Admin credentials).
architectural_notes: Do not modify any other parts of the application; specifically do not change Admin credentials. Only add the requested Dashboard filter/sort.

existing_features.title: Add a filter UI to the Admin Dashboard that allows admins to narrow the submissions table by (1) store name and (2) submitted date, without changing any other dashboard behavior.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Dashboard filter/sort option to view by date and store name; do not change any other app behavior or Admin credentials.
